entry.title: Beetroot Cookies
entry.summary:

today I cook homemade self creative cookies for fun, and it's cooked in middle night, so it's supper devilğŸ˜ˆ for me.

entry.content:
You never know one Beetroot can eat what a long time~
today I cook homemade self creative cookies for fun, and it's cooked in middle night, so it's supper devilğŸ˜ˆ for me.
The another reason I cook that is I watched ã€ŠRACHEL KHOO'S KITCHEN NOTEBOOK: LONDONã€‹

and the first her Documentary:

Firstlyï¼šthe beetroot is look like this below~

And how to made it? here is the answer:
1: Mix shredded beetroot with flour and butter, also the fruit oatmeal~
2: Using fresh keeping film cover the mixed flour and using rolling pin to roll it flat.

3: Puting out my Christmas tree mould to shape the cookies.

4: Then puting into oven 180 degree for 25 mins, done~

Aha! Super easy!
Right?!

entry.title: Spring Cocktailï½
entry.summary: Today I feel a little bit headache, so after work I go back home, enjoy my homemade cocktailğŸ¹ and youTube vlog.
entry.content:
Today I feel a little bit headache, so after work I go back home, enjoy my homemade cocktailğŸ¹ and youTube vlog.

That drink is my first create cocktail. the inspiration is from my Beetroot juice, and the successful cocktail Pina coladağŸ¸ï¼š
Pineapple, coconut, rum, iceï½
the taste is really good but I forget take photo about that.

but my home made cocktail ã€Šthe blood eyesã€‹ and ã€Šthe eyes in boodã€‹ is record by phone.
ğŸ¥ƒã€Šthe blood eyesã€‹easy and beautiful~


Recipe:

  1. ice ball
  2. rum
  3. beetroot juice

ğŸ¥ƒã€Šthe eyes in boodã€‹
Firstly you need made the beetroot juice and freeze them to ice...


Recipe:

  1. beetroot juice ball
  2. rum

I personal like the second cocktail more, cos the sweet flavour will release slowly, and the sweat taste is from the nature beetroot juice, so it's super organic and cool~

entry.title: Paper folding day!
entry.summary:
The 2020 valentine's day is coming soon~
I will folding a rose for my husband, cos I can't go outside to buy one.
now let's begin!
entry.content:
The 2020 valentine's day is coming soon~
I will folding a rose for my husband, cos I can't go outside to buy one.
now let's begin!

1 step:
now I prepare 4 papers, 3 is red and 1 is green, the size is 15cm, 11cm, 9cm, 6cm, and the 13cm green one.

2 step:
Start following step to folding the 15cm red one.
-Folding the paper quarter to quarter, made a cross in middle.

-Folding the paper from four quarters to middle.

-Fold up again.

-And again.

-Folding again from back side.

-Then start fold each quarter from the 1/2 middle line.

-Turn back the paper, the gathering the four quarters to middle.

-like this below...â¬‡ï¸ back viewï½

-turn back again and fold up the middle four quarters turn to outside.

-Then turn back to make sure each piece of petals are curly.
3 step:
Folding the rest 2 red papers up, the gluing them one by one, from bottom to top.

4 step:
Folding the green one up, and stick it on the back of the rose. (back to back)
yes, you are right, that's it!

5 step:
Final step is sticking the rose flower on the top of stick, here you are, its done~

So I have the fantastic gift to my husband, and now is 11pm, the rose will waiting for him till tmw morning...
then being the first one say "good morning~" to him~

entry.title: Creating wardrobe folder day!
entry.summary:
Today I plan to arrange the wardrobe and put them into folder then analysis them.
how I do this?
Firstlyï¼Œ taking photo of all my clothing and drop them to different folder.
entry.content:
Today I plan to arrange the wardrobe and put them into folder then analysis them.
how I do this?
Firstlyï¼Œ taking photo of all my clothing and drop them to different folder.


Each of the folder build by different category. such as top folder.

Then I find I total create 17 styles and overall have 152 pieces in winter wardrobe.

I can clear to see which category is the most one. sweater in winter is my favorite style.

Sportswear and sleepwear are also what I like, that can reflect the lifestyle and personal taste.

From the top folder, I realize that sweater and shirt is my best choice to mix and match inside, hoodies and vest are not super popular for me to wear everyday.
yes, you are right! I am the shirt person~
maybe later I will write the everyday's look for you~

entry.title: White sesame day!
entry.summary: When my husband want me cook sesame ball to him todayğŸ‘…, I have a sudden ideağŸ‘€, why we only have white sesame ball but never have black sesame ballâ¤?
entry.content:
When my husband want me cook sesame ball to him todayğŸ‘…, I have a sudden ideağŸ‘€, why we only have white sesame ball but never have black sesame ballâ¤?


I want have a try but next time...
Cos I realize that when you fry to black sesame, you can't recognize when the balls are cooked.ğŸ³ğŸ´
How to cook the lovely sesame ball?

âœ…1 step:
Prepare white glutinous rice flour 80g,
then put 45g sugar into 105g water then boil it.


âœ…2 step:
mixing flour with sugar water to make the dough, if it too soft and stick, putting 20g flour to mix again. kneading the dough until it have smooth surface.

âœ…3 step:
Spreading the flour on board and put 1/3 red bean paste, then cutting it to 18 little pieces and rolling the to become balls.



âœ…4 step:
Adding 2g oil to the dough mix and waiting the dough for 30mins, rolling the dough to a long piece and cutting it to 7 small segments.

âœ…5 step:
Pressing the segment dough middle down and put the red bean ball inside, then rolling it to small white ball.




âœ…6 step:
Preparing one bowl of flour water and one bowl of white sesame.

âœ…7 step:
Putting white ball into flour water to wet it and then putting into sesame bowl to stick on the white sesame all around the ball.



âœ…8 step:
heating the Vegetable oil to 120 degree, keeping use the small fire to fry half of them, use spoon or chopsticks to Keep stirring themï¼Œ In case them stick together.

âœ…9 step:
Waiting for them turn into yellow gold color.

âœ…10 step:
Then take them out and put into plate, done!

â°Super lovely and beautiful white sesame ball is done, ğŸµthe little prince is soooooooooooo greedy for itï¼Œhow poor the cat is, cos it smells so good! Lol~

entry.content:

entry.title: Organize my wardrobe day!
entry.summary:
Organize my wardrobe always in my mind,
but never done...
In the such a long Chinese 2020 new year holidayğŸ˜·, I decided to clean the room and clear my personal organize theory.
entry.content:
Organize my wardrobe always in my mind,
but never done...
In the such a long Chinese 2020 new year holidayğŸ˜·, I decided to clean the room and clear my personal organize theory.

âœ…1 step:
Separate the clothings to 6 big areas and 22 small styles.
You can separate your clothings by your personal styles.

âœ…2 step:
Making my clothing arrange rolls.
I design two sizes for different styles.
small size: top/blouse/pants/skirt/thin sweater.
big size: hoodies/thick sweater.

âœ…3 step:

Rolling one piece of clothing into the arrange roll.
white one is small size, yellow one is big size.

âœ…4 step:

Putting different color rolls in different area.
Separate the wardrobe bulkhead to 3 parts.
(pants+skirt, top+blouse, hoodies+sweater).

âœ…5 step:
Putting all the rolls on it area, and hanging easy wrinkle clothing on hangers.

ğŸ˜‰Cherry winks~
Next article will introduce how I organize the sportswear/underwear/socks/stockings boxğŸ“¦.
